result.execSummary:
The defendant Abraham Rivera was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possess Amphetamine/LSD/Psilocin, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(d).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Milwaukee County Clerk of Circuit Court

supervisions.descr: House of Correction - Imposed and Stayed

miscConds.notes: Pay all costs and surcharges or, if not paid, convert to a civil judgment.

AODA assessment/treatment deemed appropriate.
Maintain absolute sobriety to be monitored by random urine screens.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Abraham Rivera

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.
Notice of court ordered financial obligations

records.addlTxt: Defendant Abraham Rivera in court with attorney Matthew Adrian Lamke.  Daniel J. Gabler appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk ssm.  Case calendared for plea/sentencing hearing.  The defendant advised the Court that he was too tired to proceed with a plea today because he works third shift.  Case passed until 3:00 pm.

Defendant Abraham Rivera in court with attorney Matthew Adrian Lamke.  Sara Nicole Volden Schroeder appeared for the State of Wisconsin. CMC. Defense requests a Plea and Sentencing date. Court grants defense request. Case adjourned to branch 24.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for October 15, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Abraham Rivera in court with attorney Matthew Adrian Lamke.  Sara Nicole Volden Schroeder appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk ssm.  Court ordered case adjourned for pretrial conference in Branch 24.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for August 25, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Court ordered arrest warrant withdrawn.  Recall issued.

Court ordered no possession or use of controlled substances without a valid prescription.
Court advised defendant that failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

Defendant Abraham Rivera in court.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  OCCR Tape#15-137
Defendant advised that this case is assigned to Judge Protasiewicz, Branch 24.
Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.   Defendant received a copy of the complaint and was advised of right to counsel and maximum penalties.  Court entered a plea of not guilty on behalf of the Defendant. Court reserves Defendant's right to file a substitution of judge pursuant to Sec. 971.20 until Defendant's next scheduled court appearance.  Defendant IS Public Defender eligible.  Defendant is ordered to provide the public defender's office with the next court date.  The case is adjourned to Br. 24  for a Pretrial Conference.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for August 3, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE ARREST WARRANT.

Defendant Abraham Rivera not in court.  Michael Jerome Lonski appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered an Arrest Warrant to be issued.  Court ordered any bail posted to be forfeited.  State's motion for Judgment of Bond Forfeiture 30 days after notification from the Clerk of Circuit Court's Office is granted by the Court.  Court makes finding that there is no possible victim identified, therefore, recompense is not an issue.
SUMMONS MAILED. DEFENDANT ORDERED INTO ROOM 221 SAFETY BUILDING ON 7/15/15 @ 1:30 pm
